Package library.joints

Class JointToBody

java.lang.Object
library.joints.Joint
library.joints.JointToBody
public class JointToBody
extends Joint
Class for a joint between two bodies.

  • Constructor Details

    • JointToBody

      public JointToBody​(Body b1, Body b2, double jointLength, double jointConstant, double dampening, boolean canGoSlack, Vectors2D offset1, Vectors2D offset2)
      Constructor for a joint between two bodies.
      Parameters:
      b1 - First body the joint is attached to
      b2 - Second body the joint is attached to
      jointLength - The desired distance of the joint between two points/bodies
      jointConstant - The strength of the joint
      dampening - The dampening constant to use for the joints forces
      canGoSlack - Boolean whether the joint can go slack or not
      offset1 - Offset to be applied to the location of the joint relative to b1's object space
      offset2 - Offset to be applied to the location of the joint relative to b2's object space

  • Method Details

      Applies tension to the two bodies.

      public double calculateTension()
      Calculates tension between the two attachment points of the joints bodies.

      Returns:
      double value of the tension force between the two bodies attachment points

      Parameters:
